entries.session: U.S. Market Open (9:30 AM â€“ 11:30 AM ET)

subitems: Overnight session showed bullish strength following lower-than-expected CPI data.
Moderate volatility with strong upward bias during first hour, then consolidating.
Clear bullish sentiment observed; buyers consistently stepping in near intraday support at 4620.

trades.notes: Strong momentum breakout, exited at target
Bought at retest of intraday support

workedWell: Clear identification of bullish market sentiment from pre-market data.
Good patience and discipline on trades 1 and 3, waiting for proper entry signals.
improvement: Trade #2 was premature; reversal patterns need stronger confirmation, such as clear rejection candles or volume spikes.
Consider adjusting stop-loss placement to minimize losses on counter-trend trades.
emotional: Remained composed and patient despite initial winning trade.
Experienced slight anxiety on losing trade but recovered quickly with proper breathing techniques.
Maintained focus on risk management and did not exceed predetermined daily risk limit.
adjustments: Revisit rules for counter-trend trades to improve entry precision.
Continue practicing mindful breathing during periods of uncertainty or drawdown.
Review higher timeframe trends (4-hour, daily) more thoroughly before attempting intraday reversals.
entries.reflection: Overall, good adherence to strategy and risk management. Need to improve timing and criteria for reversal setups. Feeling confident and positive moving forward.
